titleStmt.title: The ile of guls As it hath been often playd in the blacke Fryars, by the Children of the Reuels. / VVritten by Iohn Day.
titleStmt.author: Day, John, 1574-1640?

publicationStmt.publisher: And are to bee sold by Iohn Hodgets in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with "printed for Iohn Trundle" in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
